argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ineqri.1 | |- ( ( x e. A /\ x e. B ) <-> x e. C ) |
| 2 |  | #P_elin | |- ( x e. ( A i^i B ) <-> ( x e. A /\ x e. B ) ) |
| 3 | 2, 1 | #P_bitri | |- ( x e. ( A i^i B ) <-> x e. C ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eqriv | |- ( A i^i B ) = C |
